content.rendered:
Directed by Aditya Chopra. Raj Basu.

Written by Aditya Chopra. Sharat Katariya.

Cast Ranveer Singh(Dharam). Vaani Kapoor(Shyra). Djinda Kane(Naomi). Julie Ordon(Christine). Armaan Ralhan(Aney (as Arrmaan Ralhan)). Ayesha Raza Mishra(Juhi Gill (Shyra’s Mom)). Akarsh Khurana(Jogi Gill (Shyra’s Dad)). Lassana Lestin(Policeman). Bertrand Usclat(Phonecall Guy 2). Noom Diawara(Shyra friend 3). Elisa Bachir Bey(Nathalie). Floran Royer((as Wyatt Alexander)). Pierre Cevaer(Shyra friend 1). Vincent Paquot(Phonecall Guy 3). Aru Krishansh Verma(Mehra).Marie Wadoux. Sandra Rosinsky(Slap Girl). Yun Lai(Patron).Elena ArnaÃ¯z.Charline Collonge. Pauline Deshons(Marie). Thierry Stein(SÃ©curitÃ© Lido). Guy Amram(Christine’s Father (Old)). Nashpreet(Jasmine). Megan Lamiel(Bargirl).Camille Vidacek. FranÃ§ois-Marie Nivon(Barman (as Francois-Marie Nivon)). Juliette Savary(Supermarket Salesgirl).Oceane Dailly.Veronika Filipenko. Cedric Fouque(Phonecall Guy 1). Marinelly Vaslon(Slap Girl). Pascal Ricourt(Taxi Driver). Robin Mayeur(Christine’s Brother 2). Gragory Navis(Siddharth). Victor Hanna(Finalist Contest). Kimberley Zakine(Shyra friend 4). Marie Beraud(Shyra friend 2). Delbenco Natalia(Opera Singer). Georges Benoit(Priest).Aziliz Le Guern. KÃ©vin Boyer(Christine’s Brother). Catherine Gautier(Christine’s Mother).Mila Linski. Alexandre Boumbou(Rich guest (uncredited)). Marion Roussignol(Bridesmaid (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers RaphaÃ«l Benoliel. Aditya Chopra. Antonin Depardieu. Bharat Rawail. Aashish Singh.

Production Yash Raj Films.
